title: Finally! My coffee tastes great again.
body:
I took the advice of my girlfriend to try a French Coffee Press so I found one here and it’s amazing!

I always felt my coffee was more like tea because I used a Keurig coffee machine and was finally motivated to switch to this coffee press.

Now, my coffee tastes rich and deep rather than weak like tea.

Here’s my process:
1. Two coffee scoops of Freshly ground, good quality coffee.
2. Water heated to about 180 degrees.
3. Coffee ground to a coarse grind.
4. Steep the grounds for 2-4 minutes, depending on your taste. I do 2-3 minutes.
5. Pour into coffee cup and add a teaspoon of honey and a dollop of half and half creamer.
6. Yum!

That’s the best cup of coffee I’ve discovered.
author: Greg M.
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 21 de junio de 2024

title: 自分としては満足だけど、多少、使用上の注意がある
body:
低価格で1リットルの大容量で自分としてはいい買い物をしたと思っています
でも、不満はあります

それはハンドル兼ジャケットが熱いときにゆるくて抜けやすいということです
出来上がったコーヒーを注ぎ出すときは、角度的におそらく大丈夫ですが、
カスを捨てようと、ハンドルを持って上下を逆さまにしたりなんかすると、ガラス瓶が抜け落ちてしまいます。最悪、瓶を割ってしまうことになると思います
今まで使っていた500ccのものは、そんなことはなかったと思います

title: Cime da descrizione
body:
Dopo aver spaccato la french press di Ikea, ho cercato un prodotto più robusto e più piccolo in quanto sono la sola ad usarla.
Il prodotto rispetto alla precedente press, ha un vetro più spesso, una gabbia di protezione in acciaio ed un cappuccio con filtro ben fatto e che fultra decisamente meglio. Inoltre ha in dotazione un misurino per il caffè (indica 1 dosatore per 100 ml e pa brocca è graduata) comodissimo.
La consiglio a chi cone me non ha bisogno di grandi quantità.

title: 1 Tasse Kaffee -> passt! :)
body: Wer sein Kaffeepulver schnell und einfach aufbrühen will, benötigt eine Kaffeepresse, die allermeisten sind jedoch viel zu groß, wenn man nur mal eine Tasse Kaffee zubereiten möchte. Da ich der einzige Kaffeetrinker bei uns bin, benötigte ich also eine Presse für eine Tasse - und zwar eine große Tasse (Becher). Für die Menge ist die 350 ml Presse ideal, ich kann exakt einen Kaffeebecher voll zubereiten, wenn ich das Wasser bis zum Anfang der oberen Metall-Querstrebe des Gehäuses auffülle. Den Siebeinsatz muss man sehr vorsichtig herunterdrücken, denn sonst spritzt es ganz schnell mal, also nicht zu stürmisch mit diesem kleinen Kerlchen umgehen! Beim Ausgießen kann es mal ein klein wenig tropfen. Keine Ahnung woran das liegt, ist aber kein wirkliches Problem. Der Glaseinsatz ist relativ robust. Klar er ist aus Glas und wird einen Fall aus 1 Meter Höhe auf den Boden nicht überleben, aber ich habe ihn beim Ausräumen aus dem Geschirrspüler schon mehr als einmal, quer über die Arbeitsplatte gekegelt und er hat das locker weggesteckt. Was will man mehr. Ich bin zufrieden!
author: KaJe
date: Revisado en Alemania el 20 de octubre de 2023

title: １年近く使って
body: 初めてのフレンチプレス。紅茶の時には問題ないが、肝心のコーヒーの時は、フィルターが傾いて、粉は出るし、傾いたために、コーヒーも底に少し残ってしまいます。フィルターを傾かないようにする方法を教えてください。後日メールで問い合わせたところ、フィルターを押さえているナットの向きが、上下反対だと説明をいただき、ナットの向きを反対にしてみたら、今度はフィルターがはまらず困ってしまいましたが、家族が黒いフィルターを上下反対にしてくれたらフィルターもスムーズにはまっておいしいコーヒーが出来ました。有難うございました。フィルターやナットは分解して洗うものなので、組み立てるときに間違えない工夫か、説明書があると助かります。

body: Me ha durado 1 mes… el cristal se ha partido. Ha funcionado mal desde el primer día, no bajaba bien el filtro, el café se sale al servirlo, el filtro no filtra bien. Compré esta cafetera pensando que por precio sería algo mejor pero no. Definitivamente hay mejores opciones.

date: Revisado en España el 23 de diciembre de 2023

title: Buena
body: Me gusta, sin embargo la tapa queda un poco holgada.

date: Revisado en España el 30 de noviembre de 2022

title: Corriente
body: Da sensación de inestabilidad porque la tapa se mueve mucho cuando la usas, no me ha gustado este detalle porque no queda bien sujeta, se mueve mucho y es incómoda. Lo mejor es que tiene varios filtros que hacen que el café apenas tenga posos. Por lo demás es una simple cafetera de émbolo.

date: Revisado en España el 19 de junio de 2023

title: Recomendada
body: Va de lujo, súper fácil de limpiar y buen precio
author: Yas
date: Revisado en España el 18 de marzo de 2022

title: Muy buen producto
body:
Esta cafetera es un gran producto, el vidrio es de muy buena calidad, y de muy buena calidad los materiales de plástico. El filtrado es muy bueno, solo recordar que el molido de tu café debe ser el adecuado para este método y trae un segundo filtro en case de un molido mas fino.Estéticamente a mi me parece muy bonita y creo que luce muy bien.
También compré el modelo de 350 ml y es muy buena para llevarla contigo a paseos
Lo único malo es que en los últimos dias el precio aumentó ,pero la verdad vale la pena la inversión.
No duden en comparla
author: raymundo
date: Revisado en México el 20 de julio de 2022

title: Large and sturdy French press
body:
Bought this as a replacement when my previous French press broke.

I was a bit skeptical about buying from a brand I hadn't heard of before, but I have been very happy with my purchase.

The metal frame provides protection for the glass breaker, which is easily removable for cleaning. The filter meshes are excellent, and do a better job than my previous name brand press.

I'm glad I ordered this over the famous-name brand, I got a bigger and better product for my money.
author: AmerAussie Mom
date: Revisado en Australia el 7 de mayo de 2023

title: Flavour
body: I like this coffee plungger because it's eazy to use and the coffee flavore is true.

title: Good

title: Good For A Single Person!
body: Very small and simple. But is great for someone who only drinks 1cup of coffee per day, like myself. Is lightweight but sturdy. Is as easy to clean as French Presses can be. I've had this French Press since June of this year and I've yet to have any problems with it. Definitely will purchase again in the future.

Communication has been excellent while working out the details.

title: Beste French Press, die ich je hatte
body:

Tolle Haptik, weil Gummierung an der Unterseite. 👍🏻
Glaskanne ist nicht zu locker, dass sie rausrutscht, lässt sich aber zum reinigen leicht ausziehen. 👍🏻
Perfekte Größe für eine Tasse. 👍🏻
Die ml Anzeige ist sehr vorteilhaft für den perfekten Kaffee.👍🏻
Einziger negativer Punkt ist, dass sie manchmal beim ausgießen etwas tropft, wenn man das Gitter nicht genau mittig hat.

title: Good not perfect
body: This is a good french press, but not perfect. It is easy to clean because it comes apart easily. It's easy to use just like any other french press. But the specific design problems are where I take points away. When you press the top down to press your coffee the lid is not perfectly fitted to the glass so it wobbles horribly if you don't hold the lid with your other hand. The other issue is that the lip of the lid used when you are not pouring is too short to create a seal. The lid's improper fit is also an issue here because it allows that "closed" lip to wobble around creating even more of an opening for air that cools and stales your fresh pressed coffee. 🙄
author: Cathleen
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 2 de febrero de 2023

title: 取っ手の構造が良ければ
body:
紅茶で使用していますが、濾す方は通常のフィルターからたまに漏れる茶葉も注ぎ口にあるスリットが補助的に機能してか良好です。
ただ取っ手部分が容器をガードするような形なのは良いですが、洗う際に底周りの隙間から入った水が底部分に溜まり、また乾きづらく場合によってはその後の使用中にポタポタと垂れてくるため容器部だけを抜き取って洗っています。
ただ何度も抜き差しすることで容器にスジ状の傷がつくのと、抜けやすくなってくる点がマイナスです。（逆さにしなければ抜けはしませんが…）

title: Does the Job!
body: This Easyworkz French Press 350ml Coffee Tea Maker with Borosilicate Glass, Soft Grip Handle is great! easy to use! easy to clean! Nice and sturdy! Does the job! Nice and handy good value for money
author: G&B reviews
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 5 de junio de 2022

title: Great Coffee, Wish It Was Larger
body: For sure this makes some of the best coffee, better than drip, as good as pour over but easier and with more control over the strength of the brew. I had french press years ago which left a lot of sediment but this one left very little so was glad for that. It was smaller than expected and wish it would make at least 16 ounces. At the nine ounce point it filled my 16 ounce mug just a little over half. That's fine for my afternoon coffee but for my first morning coffee that doesn't cut it. Yet the bottom line is the coffee it makes is outstanding so I'm putting a larger on my personal Christmas list.
author: DMAdam47
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 15 de septiembre de 2021

title: Small but I like it
body:
This Easyworkz French Press is small. It wasn't a surprise that it would be small but it is smaller than expected. That's okay for me because I am using it for my once-a-day-in-the-morning coffee which is usually on the smaller side anyway.

Functionally, it is simple to use. I do like that it is easy to clean. It is also easy to store and doesn't take up a lot of space. So, while it is smaller than I thought it would be, it works as I need.
author: sanoe.net
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 15 de octubre de 2021

title: works quite well, small as it says
body: This works quite well. Easy to use, is well made, everything fits well and it all moves smoothly. Does its job without any issues whatsoever. Easy to clean and easy to maneuver given its size. It's definitely small though, which isn't a complaint given that it tells you upfront how big it is. But don't think they're underselling themselves. It's a single-cup version and a small cup at that. This will not fill your 18-20 oz. travel mug. If the size is not a dealbreaker, it's a lot easier to store and fits into nooks and crannies well and does exactly the job you want it to.
author: B. Capossere
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 24 de octubre de 2021

title: Much smaller than anticipated but does the job
body:
This is a really nice French press coffee maker.
It is much smaller than I thought it would be though.
It only just fills my mug three quarters of the way.
That being said I do love the design and that it comes apart completely and easily to make sure everything can be cleaned properly.
It’s also dishwasher safe.
Great for a small, quick brew but if you want a lasting coffee, get the bigger version!
author: KerryAnne
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 18 de noviembre de 2021

title: Nice Portable French Press
body:
We love this french press!
We use it as a camping, portable french press and has worked great.

It would be nice if it was a bit bigger, but we can't complain and usually just make two rounds of it!
author: Simplyglamorous
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 2 de enero de 2022

title: Smaller than large French Press
body: After my last k cup machine I decided to go back to French Press. When I got this one I was a little disappointed by its smaller size, but now that I have used it I prefer the smaller size. Make like a 12 oz cup. I only drink one cup, so this is the better size for one cup use. If you need two cups get a larger French Press. This makes stronger coffee than Kcup, but I like it stronger-not bitter though.
author: juliawillc
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 12 de noviembre de 2022

title: Great replacement for one I broke.
body: I had a 12 oz. French press maker I used for many years. Unfortunately I hit the carafe against the porcelain sink and it cracked. I found this one as a replacement and it is better than the old one and the glass carafe is better protected with the plastic surrounding it. It also has a secondary filter which insures no grounds will get through. Very satisfied.
author: Anne
date: Revisado en los Estados Unidos el 22 de febrero de 2023

title: BEST FRENCH PRESS EVER
body:
I’ve been using French presses for + 30 years.
the Espro, with its double filter and seal allows you to drink super tasty coffee without it getting bitter. My friends are always impressed when I brew some for them.
Very easy to clean. I have a P3 and a P5. and love them both.

title: Very pleased with this item.
body: I'm so glad I didn't buy the one I originally intended to purchase. After years of using and breaking the major brand name french press I saw this one and it looked better. Wow, is it ever better! Very sturdy construction with all stainless steel cage and filter stem. Plus, a much better filtration system than the other one. I'm very happy.

title: 丁度いい水量です。
body:
我が家ではルイボスティーの抽出用に
使っています。

１リットルちょうどの容量がお茶のお湯出し用に
ちょうど良い感じで重宝しております。
紅茶はもう少し小さめのポットで十分、
ですがルイボスティーは大きめの器で
一日分の分量を作りたかったので、
ぴったりの加減で助かります。

本体もガラス部分とプラスチックの把手部に
分かれているため洗いやすく扱いやすいため、
置き場に余裕があるなら一つあっても
良いかと。
大容量用のティーバッグで使うのには、
これぐらいの大きさでも良い感じです。
author: 紅波 焔涵
date: Revisado en Japón el 21 de febrero de 2023

title: Lovely coffee pot
body: Looks smart - good quality finish. Couldn’t be happier with it.
author: Amazon Customer

title: Perfect size!
body: I bought the small one and it's perfect for a cup of coffee. Filters great and is easy to clean up.

title: Scheint robust zu sein
body:
Nun, er ist etwas teuerer, aber er macht bis Dato einen sehr guten Eindruck, sprich er tut das was er soll .
Auf jeden Fall eine Empfehlung wert
author: Eckard

title: Does what it says on the box
body: Works as expected. Nice, sturdy and of good quality. Easy to clean and comes with a plastic spoon to add coffee into the french press with. Can't complain
